price: 68. (Luud) wuxuu yidhi: Kuwakanu waa martidaydii ee ha igu fadayxeynina.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna hāulāi ḍayfī falā tafḍaḥūni
